text: The canton of Gardanne is an administrative division of the Bouches-du-Rhône department, in southeastern France. At the French canton reorganisation which came into effect in March 2015, it was expanded from 4 to 5 communes. Its seat is in Gardanne.Décret n° 2014-271 du 27 février 2014 portant délimitation des cantons dans le département des Bouches-du-Rhône It consists of the following communes: #Gardanne #Mimet #Les Pennes-Mirabeau #Septèmes-les-Vallons #Simiane-Collongue ==References== Category:Cantons of Bouches-du-Rhône
title: Canton of Gardanne
